page.text: This computer can access countless thousands of bytes of data on its reel to reel tapes. It seems the blueprint repository tapes are still in good condition.
tape directory: interplanetary reactor, solar furnace, photonic cannon.

Containment using ferrous high density plates and low level magnetic fields creates a chamber where fuel can be safely ignited, the exhaust and unburnt fuel can then be channeled into the drives allowing a second stage of ignition and a more complete burning of fuel and as a result more energetic and higher velocity exhaust.
